title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Driven and detail-oriented Master's student with a strong foundation in AI/ML, cybersecurity, and full-stack development. Proven ability to architect and implement robust solutions, including an AI-powered mock interview platform, a desktop file security application with AES-256 encryption, and a dynamic job portal. Proficient in Python, React, SQL, and AWS, with a keen interest in leveraging technology for secure and intelligent system design.

bullets: Developed an AI-powered mock interview platform facilitating realistic, role-specific job interview simulations via voice, video, or text responses.
Leveraged advanced NLP, Speech Analysis, and Computer Vision to evaluate over 7 key verbal and non-verbal cues (e.g., fluency, tone, facial expressions, confidence).
Engineered with React, Python (FastAPI/Flask), Whisper, GPT-4, and MediaPipe for scalable performance.
items.name: Intervue.AI

bullets: Engineered a desktop file security application with robust AES-256 encryption, validating a 100% data protection rate in compliance with data security policies and audit requirements.

Developed a real-time Intrusion Detection System (IDS) to monitor file access patterns, effectively detecting and logging 98% of simulated malicious activities, serving as critical evidence for security assurance assessments.
Integrated a MySQL database to securely manage over 500 user credentials and file metadata, ensuring data integrity and establishing comprehensive audit trails for system governance.
items.name: CypherStack

bullets: Architected and deployed a dynamic job portal, implementing secure user authentication and role-based access control for multiple user types in adherence to IT policy and compliance standards.

Managed the MySQL database schema for over 200 active job postings and applications, ensuring data integrity and detailed record-keeping for over 1,000 application records, critical for audit evidencing.
Spearheaded system design and functionality, emphasizing robust data handling and secure architecture, demonstrating a foundational understanding of IT governance and assurance principles.
items.name: Job Portal
Appreciation Prize
